auth.terms_agree: Anabụ n'obi na ụkpụ na ụlọ iwu
auth.privacy_agree: Ọ dị m ụtọ na ụdị m ga-eji eme nkwekọ a
auth.login_failed: Iji aba akwụsị. Biko nwaa ọzọ.
auth.register_failed: Iji gbanye akwụsị. Biko nwaa ọzọ.

dashboard.title: Bọọdụ Njehie
dashboard.self_exclusions_active: Emubụ gị dị ka ugbu a
dashboard.warning_excluded: Ị nwere emubụ onwe gị dị ka ugbu a. A kụdiri gị site na ndị na-agbagha ihe nlegharị anya nile n'oge a.
dashboard.cannot_register: Enweghị ike ime emubụ ọhụrụ mgbe dị ka kwa ka dị
dashboard.how_self_exclusion_works: → Ọdịiche Emubụ Gị Si Arụ Ọrụ
dashboard.why_extending: Gini kpatara gị na-agbatịa emubụ gị?
dashboard.important_notice: Ihe Mkpa: Iji gbatịa emubụ gị ga-agbakwunye oge ahọrọ gị n'ubochi gị akwụ emubụ.

self_exclude.title: Gbanye maka Emubụ Onwe Gị
self_exclude.subtitle: Nweta ọ karịrị egwuregwu gị
self_exclude.description: Emubụ onwe gị bụ ngwá ọrụ nke a na-ahọ iji nyere gị aka izere egwuregwu. Mgbe ị gbanwela nke NSER, ndị na-ebighi egwuregwu ga-agbanarị na-egbochi gị site n'ịnweta ọrụ ha.
self_exclude.success_message: Emubụ onwe gị agbanweela nke ọma
self_exclude.error_message: Iji gbanye akwụsị. Biko nwaa ọzọ.
self_exclude.confirmation_text: Ị na-achọ iji gbanye maka emubụ onwe gị. Omume a bụ iwu n'elu.

assessment.title: Nche Ihe ize Ndụ
assessment.subtitle: Tinye nche izu oyi egwuregwu
assessment.description: Nche a na-enyere anyị aka ịghọta usoro egwuregwu gị na ọkwa ihe ize ndụ.
assessment.low_risk_interpretation: Nche gị na-egosi ụdị egwuregwu na-enwe ihe ize ndụ dị ala. Gaa n'ihu na ezi omume ma lelee ọrụ gị.
assessment.medium_risk_interpretation: Nche gị na-egosi ụdị egwuregwu kacha ntutu. Tụlee ịhapụ Limit ma merempe omume gị oge niile.
assessment.high_risk_interpretation: Nche gị na-egosi egwuregwu nke ihe ize ndụ dị elu. A na-akwado nkwado nke ọkachamara.
assessment.severe_risk_interpretation: Nche gị na-egosi ụdị egwuregwu siri ike. Nkwado nke ọkachamara ozugbo akwadoro.
assessment.next_step_1: Lelee ọzọ usoro egwuregwu gị na setụpu mmalite
assessment.next_step_2: Tụlee ikwu okwu n'onye ọrụ ma ọ bụ onye ọkachamara
assessment.next_step_3: Tinye nche ọzọ n'ụbọchị 30 ka ileghachika mma
assessment.current_risk_profile: Profaịl Ihe ize Ndụ Ugbu a

help.title: Enyemaka na Nkwado
help.subtitle: Nweta Enyemaka na Ihe Eme
help.how_it_works: Ọdịiche Emubụ Onwe Si Arụ Ọrụ
help.chat_description: Onụ ọnu na Otu Nkwado Anyị
help.what_is_self_exclusion_answer: Emubụ onwe bụ ngwá ọrụ na-akwado iji zia onwe gị maka Emubụ site na ndị na-agbagha ihe nlegharị anya nile ruo oge ahọrọ gị. N'oge a, ndị na-agbagha ihe nlegharị anya ga-agbanarị na-egbochi gị site n'ịnweta ọrụ ha.
help.can_cancel_early: Enwere m ike iji kagbuo emubụ onwe m mgbe ngwa ngwa?
help.can_cancel_early_answer: Mba, emubụ onwe bụ iwu ma enweghị ike iji kagbuo ya n'oge emubụ. A na-edide ya iji chekwaa gị. Naanị n'okwu nkịtị naanị ka enwere ike iji weghachie mgbe ngwa ngwa - kpọtụ nkwado maka ozi ọzọ.
help.will_carry_over: Enwere m emubụ onwe m ga-ebufu n'etiti ndị na-agbagha ihe nlegharị anya?
help.will_carry_over_answer: Ee! Emubụ onwe gị edeela n'ụlọ ihe nlegharị anya mba na ndị na-agbagha ihe nlegharị anya niile nwere ikike agbanarị na-ele ụlọ ihe a mgbe ị na-achọ ịnweta ọrụ ha.
help.update_profile: Kedu etu m ga-edezigharị profaịl m?
help.update_profile_answer: Ịnwere ike idezigharị profaịl gị site na nhazi akụntụ na bọọdụ gị. Ịnwere ike iji doodwọ ihe jikọtara, isi ezi omume na nkambi akụntụ ọzọ.
help.verify_identity: Kedu etu m ga-ekwado ụdị m?
help.verify_identity_answer: Ịnwere ike guchaa nkwadebe ụdị site na nhazi akụntụ. Bufe ihe ngosi ụdị i wetara gọvọnmenti ma ọ kwejuo n'ubochi 24-48.
help.enable_2fa: Kedu etu m ga-emebere Nkwadebe Abụọ?
help.enable_2fa_answer: Gaa na nhazi nche ma emebere 2FA. I ga-akarị ọnụ ọgụgụ site na SMS ma ọ bụ app nkwadebe maka nche ọzọ akụntụ.
help.account_compromised: Gini m ga-eme ma akụntụ m merụrụ?
help.account_compromised_answer: Doodwọ okwu nzuzo ngwa ngwa ma emebere 2FA ma ọ bụ na a emebe ya. Ma ọ bụ na ịdodotata mma adịghị ikike, kpọtụ nkwado ozugbo nke nkambi akụntụ gị.
help.available_assessments_answer: Anyị na-enye nche atọ echiche: LIEBET (ule mwere obere), PGSI (ebe guzọ), na DSM-5 (ụkpụ ọkachamara). Ndị a na-enyere gị aka ịnweta ọkwa ihe ize ndụ egwuregwu gị.
